abstract: German government proposes broad range of measures aimed at combating terrorism following series of deadly attacks; package, most comprehensive since Europe became consistent target of extremists, has raised some concerns about civil liberties.

headline.print_headline: Germany Proposes Measures to Combat Terrorism
headline.main: Germany Proposes Tougher Measures to Combat Terrorism

snippet: The interior minister outlined a package of plans that included closer monitoring of refugees and making it a crime to express sympathy for terrorism....
lead_paragraph: The interior minister outlined a package of plans that included closer monitoring of refugees and making it a crime to express sympathy for terrorism.
